attributes.action: intervene and stop Harriet Harmans new proposed 'Equality Bill'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Harriet Harman is proposing to make it legal for firms to discriminate in favour of female and ethnic minorities job candidates. (taken from the BBC News website).

Aren't we supposed to be a Nation of equality?  

We're told everyday by various sources that we musn't discriminate with this, and we musn't discriminate because of that etc.. and this bill clearly undermines all of that with *legalised discrimination*!!
